item.title: Broken tarmac round drain, 17th November
item.description:
This drain cover was repaired under your previous reference 7593905 but as you can see didn’t last very long We get a lot of buses and heavy duty traffic now using Penhill Road every time a vehicle drives over the drain it bangs so it must be working loose so presume if not fixed it can only get worse and could be dangerous for cyclists thank you Chris Goodwin

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 58, Penhill Road, Blendon, Bexleyheath, London Borough of Bexley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Old sofa dumped on Dunstans Road, 17th November
item.description:
This sofa has been left outside 148 Dunstans Road for months now and when walking past today we saw a rat coming out from under the tarpaulin. Please can it be removed?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 142, Dunstan's Road, East Dulwich, London Borough of Southwark

item.title: Mattress left on pavement, 17th November
item.description:
Noticed this Sunday evening, there's still a discarded mattress on the pavement - it's been there for couple of weeks now, no one reported it and it seems it was set on fire. Please remove it, thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Main Road, St Paul's Cray, Orpington, London Borough of Bromley
